definition: Ai (c. 2000 BC), sixth of legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God, also known as Li 釐|厘[Li2]
sorrow/grief/pity/to grieve for/to pity/to lament/to condole

sentences.english: The faded flower sighs that the spring has vanished for ever.
sentences.chinese: 凋落的殘花朵哀嘆道，春已永逝。

sentences.english: I choke with sobs ah full of sorrow, lament that they are like to crash.
sentences.chinese: 我泣不成聲啊滿心悲傷，哀嘆自己是這樣生不逢辰。

sentences.english: For the West, there's no point in whining about this trend.
sentences.chinese: 對於西方來說，爲這種趨勢而哀嘆是沒有意義的。

sentences.english: Meng hundred thousand turn back, lamenting it hard.
sentences.chinese: 幽夢百轉千回，哀嘆難平。

sentences.english: She lamented to us about her wretched lot.
sentences.chinese: 她向我們哀嘆自己悲慘的遭遇。

sentences.english: And one has to save one's breath and bewail under violence.
sentences.chinese: 在暴力之下只能沉默和哀嘆。

sentences.english: Some Chinese lament that this is already happening.
sentences.chinese: 有些中國人哀嘆說這已經發生了。

sentences.english: No one is bemoaning the loss of farm jobs.
sentences.chinese: 卻沒有人哀嘆農業勞動力的流失。

sentences.english: But although it must be deplored, there are limits to its dangers.
sentences.chinese: 儘管值得哀嘆，但這一危險又是有限的。

sentences.english: This, unexpectedly is from the time of the few lament all day he will become energetic old mouth.
sentences.chinese: 這話，竟然是出自整天哀嘆時光不多的耄耋老人之口。

sentences.english: Ignore it, would at flower hurt English remnants behind sigh in sorrow grief.
sentences.chinese: 漠視它，只會在花敗英殘後哀嘆感傷。

sentences.english: The price of passivity bemoans the silence of progress.
sentences.chinese: 被動的代價哀嘆着毫無進展。

sentences.english: Then the queen began to lament and cry, so that the manikin pitied her.
sentences.chinese: 然後，王后開始哀嘆和哭泣，使假人同情她。

sentences.english: The old man leaned against the wall, bewailing his misfortune.
sentences.chinese: 老漢靠在牆上，哀嘆自己的不幸。

sentences.english: The accusation isn't surprising, bemoans Chang Jung-hun, a 69-year-old melon farmer.
sentences.chinese: 張榮勳，一個69歲的瓜農民的指責是不奇怪，哀嘆。

definition: to cry piteously/anguished wailing/same as 哀嚎
the still of the night (idiom)/late at night
overwhelmed with shock, horror or amazement/dumbstruck/aghast
scene which recalls past memories (idiom)/evocative of the past/reminiscent/to arouse deep feelings
to gain nothing/to end up empty-handed
